title: ISic002991. I.Sicily inscription 002991
body:
Facsimile Images

1[..]Χ
2[. 4-5..]ΡΗΣ
3ΤΑΧΑΙΡΕivy-leaf
4ΕΖΗΣΕΣivy-leaf
5ΕΤΗivy-leafΚ´ivy-leaf

Apparatus criticus

  • Text checked against photograph

English translation

To the underworld spirits. [---] a good woman, farewell! You lived for 20 years.

Italian translation

Agli dei inferi ...addio, degna...! Vivesti 20 anni.

commentary

bibliography

  • Libertini 1949 96 no. 2 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001865
